backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report documenting a UI fix for table height interactions in two frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing styles, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH-themed color variables for light and dark modes with global border and background rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Leaflet assets and mounting the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component providing theme support and rendering the EarthquakeDashboard.
frontend/src/components/earthquake/Dashb: Displays total events, above-threshold count, and largest-magnitude event using cards and badges.
frontend/src/components/earthquake/Earth: Dialog showing detailed earthquake info with optional moment tensor data fetched on demand.
Leaflet-based map that filters and renders markers only within current viewport bounds with debounced updates.
Renders a virtualized table of earthquake results with selectable rows and moment-tensor indicators.
frontend/src/components/earthquake/FeedA: Provides UI controls for time window, magnitude, search, and refresh actions for filtering USGS feeds.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and persistence through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useUsgsEarthquakes.ts: Fetches and caches USGS earthquake feed data with auto-refresh using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useUsgsEventDetail.ts: Loads and caches detailed USGS event data by URL with optional enable control.
frontend/src/hooks/useVirtualWindow.ts: Calculates a virtualized item window based on scroll position to optimize rendering of large lists.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theming variables, dark mode, and Leaflet z-index adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/earthquakeFilters.ts: Implements filtering and sorting of USGS features by time window, magnitude, and location query.
frontend/src/lib/earthquakeMapBounds.ts: Filters earthquakes to those inside padded map bounds with date-line wrapping support.
frontend/src/lib/earthquakeStats.ts: Computes basic stats from a list of USGS features, including total count, number above a magnitude threshold, and the largest magnitude event.
frontend/src/lib/fetchJson.ts: Fetches a URL and returns parsed JSON, throwing an error on non‑OK HTTP responses.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides helpers to format timestamps, magnitudes, depths, and coordinates into human‑friendly strings.
frontend/src/lib/leafletTypes.ts: Defines minimal Leaflet TypeScript interfaces and utilities, including marker creation with color and size based on magnitude.
frontend/src/lib/mmi.ts: Supplies utilities to convert numeric MMI values into Roman numerals and descriptive labels.
frontend/src/lib/usgsEventDetailTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript types for detailed USGS event data, including moment tensor product structures.
frontend/src/lib/usgsFeeds.ts: Builds USGS feed URLs, provides time‑window options, and maps magnitudes to labels and colors.
frontend/src/lib/usgsTypes.ts: Declares core USGS GeoJSON feature and response types plus filter parameter types.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/EarthquakeDashboard.t: Implements the main dashboard with filtering, stats, table/map views, theming, and earthquake selection.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, plugins, animations, and content scanning rules.
project_state.json: Describes project state, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions for the earthquake web app.
